html:
1.16.18  10:15 pm   how do i convince myself to stay motivated

     you have to look at what your motivation actually is. if there is none, then you should have no reason to do the thing. if you do have a reason to do it, then congratulations you are motivated

1.16.18  10:11 pm   Favorite card game?

     business cards

1.16.18  10:11 pm   what year is it

     i have it written down somewhere

1.16.18  10:10 pm   too much chunks and sludge, how to remove?

     try a rake?

1.16.18  10:10 pm   Bill Wurtz? More like Bill Shirts! Will we get some Bill Wurtz umbrella shirt merch?

     did you check here

1.16.18  10:08 pm   how do i create stuff when i'm sad?

     there are infinite ways. you'll just have to start trying some ways

1.16.18  10:06 pm   What book are you reading?

     right now i'm reading the questions

1.16.18  10:05 pm   How does one achieve happiness?

     by surprise

1.16.18  10:01 pm   i am afraid of making music

     that is understandable, it is very dangerous

1.16.18  9:53 pm   what was the inspiration to your minimalistic and simple, yet elegant website design?

     give them the content!

1.16.18  9:50 pm   What's your background in music/theory/jazz theory?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.16.18  9:46 pm   All your songs (at least recently) seem to be mostly in a major key. How do you feel about doing songs in minor keys?

     fine

1.16.18  9:44 pm   Will you run for president of the world?

     i don't think i have time

1.16.18  9:43 pm   is gender real

     i wlll check

1.16.18  9:43 pm   What's your least favorite thing on the internet?

     when you can't even see the damn content because they're trying to collect your email address or something

1.16.18  9:39 pm   What happens when you divide yourself by 0? Asking for a friend.

     to divide something into zero parts, you need subtraction not division

1.16.18  9:37 pm   your new video is a fucking banger my guy, what do u think of me trying to seduce a woman with it

     do you think she won't find out you didn't make it

1.16.18  9:37 pm   how long has the concept for la de da been cookin'?

     the chorus was written in september 2012, but the first verse was actually written in february 2009. although it was fixed a tiny bit in 2012. and the remainder of the song was written in october 2017

1.16.18  9:36 pm   was the new song worth the wait?

     i didn't wait for it. i started it immediately after finishing my previous video, and worked on it until it was done

1.16.18  9:25 pm   Are you going to make a full length album?

     i keep deciding that it's better to release 1 song at a time

1.16.18  9:24 pm   You should run for President.

     i don't think i have time

     Are you planning to run for President?

     no

     If so, what shoes will you be wearing? 

     i would get some hot fresh sneakers, then i would call and check the dress code, and then they would tell me 'don't wear sneakers', and then i would show up wearing boring not-sneakers, only to find out that all the other candidates are wearing hot fresh sneakers, which would force me to try twice as hard to win the election

1.16.18  9:20 pm   Are geese just emo swans?

     i thought swans were emo geese

1.16.18  9:18 pm   how do u feel about the current political climate?

     it has been phenomenal in the ratings

1.16.18  9:17 pm   Would you consider yourself a philosopher?

     i say cut out the middle man, and just do the thinking

1.16.18  9:16 pm   how do i piano good

     ask the piano

1.16.18  9:11 pm   Is youre song New Cannan about Ct Or Pensivina

     it is about connecticut, i tried to explain that clearly in the song

     cause that would e dope cause I live in ct New cannan and also if you did is it just a song about new cannan or did you write it and you like grew up their.

     i took a trip there, on the metro north train, from new york city, and brought a notebook with some staff paper and wrote the song along the way

1.16.18  9:10 pm   How do you decide what goes into each video, like what was the thought process that led to that spinning panda for a brief second in La de da de da de da de day oh?

     there was a riff there. something needed to go there

1.16.18  9:09 pm   Do you have any hobbies besides history and music?

     yes. actually history is not a hobby any more. last year i did way too much

1.16.18  9:03 pm   How do you make your brain stop playing "Africa" by Toto on repeat?

     start listening to pamela instead

1.16.18  8:54 pm   have you ever heard of this guy called bill wurtz on youtube?

     he is not from youtube, he is from billwurtz dot com, but he also posts his material on youtube, for convenience. he is also me

1.16.18  8:52 pm   Can you release the new song on Spotify? 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:50 pm   Are you running for president?

     no

1.16.18  8:48 pm   Hey Bill, I fucking love your new song. I am gonna listen to it so much. Can you release it on Spotify as well as your website? 

     it is important to remember that normal human beings are not allowed to release songs to spotify. all we can do is send the song to spotify (actually we have to pay a company to send it there for us) and then hope that spotify accepts it quickly, and is not confused by spelling errors

1.16.18  8:48 pm   Bill, it's been 2 minutes and the song isn't on Spotify. Can you release it on Spotify? 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:47 pm   FUCKING RELEASE THE NEW SONG ALREADY (on Spotify) 

     it is important to remember that normal human beings are not allowed to release songs to spotify. all we can do is send the song to spotify (actually we have to pay a company to send it there for us) and then hope that spotify accepts it quickly, and is not confused by spelling errors

1.16.18  8:47 pm   Can you release the new song on Spotify????? 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:47 pm   Hey, Bill. I love the new song. Csn you release in on Spotify?? 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:46 pm   RELEASE THE NEW SONG ON SPOTIFY!!! 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:46 pm   Bill, it's okay if you don't want to. It's completely your choice. But can you release the new song on Spotify? 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:46 pm   My life might be going down a path I don't want it to. How do I cope if it does?

     turn around and go back to where the path separated from the other path. or maybe there is another separation point near you

1.16.18  8:46 pm   Please release the new somg on Spotify 

     it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:46 pm   Are you going to release the La De Da De Da song on Spotify? 

      it would be there already if i didn't spell it wrong the first time

1.16.18  8:44 pm   You ever thought about doing a tour?

     oh hell yeah

      I would pay to see you live

1.16.18  8:32 pm   where is my giraffe?

     where did you last have it

1.16.18  8:31 pm   Hi Wurtz, how well does your life make you feel?

     good, and sometimes bad

     Anything you could change in the world, yourself, or even in someone else?

     everything changes constantly, and it's fun

     Do you think the world is evil,

     no

     or is there good left somewhere?

1.16.18  8:29 pm   the ibm supercomputer called me depressed what do i do

     call it depressed?

1.16.18  8:24 pm   Hey bill i'm a person. what do i do?

     document your experience

1.16.18  8:21 pm   my brain is lopsided

     ah, #relatable

1.16.18  8:18 pm   How do we make the world better?

     start by figuring out how good it currently is

1.16.18  8:18 pm   colors are cool?

     that's true
